pages.text: The $(item)Soul Alloy Hatchet$() is a powerful tool, both in damage and the $(thing)Soul Feller$() ability. Upon $(thing)right-clicking$(), a destructive beam is emitted that will obliterate any logs on contact. The $(item)Soul Alloy Hatchet$() can be refined using $(l:conjuring:basics/basic_gem_tinkering#aspect_gems)Aspect Gems$() in these ways:$(br) $(li)$(#007a18)≈ Haste: Improves the efficiency of felling trees with the hatchet.$(br)

$(li)$(#a80f01)ღ Abundance: Rewards the killer with larger spoils when eradicating an enemy.$()$(br) $(li)$(#4d8184)λ Scope: Increases the reach of the Soul Felling ability.$()$(br) $(li)$(#123f89)ʊ Ignorance: Ignores a small amount of durability loss when using the tool. Stacks with Unbreaking.
